Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Master Neloth asked me to acquire a Staff of the Silver Dawn and deliver it to him.
I do not have any chores for you. Check with my patron, Master Neloth, or with the other Mouths.
Mistress Therana is concerned about a slave rebellion in one of her holdings.
I do not have any chores for you. Speak with the other Mouths if you need chores.
Or you could speak with Mistress Therana again, though I would not recommend it.
I know of no other chores Archmagister Gothren needs done.
You may speak with him directly or speak with one of the other Mouths.
Archmagister Gothren has learned the location of the Dwemer ruin of Nchuleft.
I do not have any more chores for you. Check with the other Mouths and with my patron, Master Aryon.
Master Aryon wants me to bring him a Daedra skin.
The Telvanni Apothecary in Tel Vos is running out of Cure Blight potions.
I have heard that the Blight has infested the Mudan-Mul Egg Mine.
I admire what you have accomplished in House Telvanni, but any student of mine must learn the rudimentary wizard spells.
One of our fellow Telvanni, Milyn Faram, is being assaulted by members of House Hlaalu at Odirniran.
Thanks to recent agreements with House Hlaalu, we have a chance of passing a resolution which would overturn the Mages Guild monopoly.
There is another Telvanni in trouble. I do not normally interfere with these matters, but I have taken an interest in this one.
I need someone to stop the Redoran attack on Faves Andas in Shishi.
If you wish to become a Wizard in House Telvanni, you must have someone to represent you in the Telvanni Council Hall.
Find a promising Telvanni to be your Mouth.
I do not have any chores for you at this time.
Find out what you need for advancement and speak with me again.
If you need chores, speak with the other Councilors or their Mouths.
The other Great Houses have also built strongholds without the Duke's charter.
While we Telvanni can defend our holdings, the other Houses cannot.
I want you to visit the Hlaalu Stronghold of Rethan Manor and retire the Hlaalu noble Raynasa Rethan.
The Redoran Stronghold of Indarys Manor also deserves a visit from House Telvanni. Retire the young Redoran noble Banden Indarys.
Only one thing remains and prevents you from declaring yourself Master.
You must see Llunela Hleran once more and find out what must be done to defend your stronghold and discourage Redoran or Hlaalu retaliation.
I am prepared to declare you a Magister of House Telvanni.
But you should be aware of what a Magister is and does.
You are the Archmagister of House Telvanni.
I may have need of you later, but for now you should study and practice so that you may advance further in House Telvanni.
I am interested in the Ring of Dahrk Mezalf.
I have no more chores for you, outlander.
Chores? Do I look like a servant?
I don't have to take orders from you! Did you hear what I said?!
Yes, that's better. I remember when I was a little girl, and I had to do chores.
"Stir this netch blood, Therana."
"Grind these diamonds, Therana."
"Nice girls don't keep spiders as pets, Therana."
I have no chores for you. Ask someone else.
I have no more chores for you. Just get out of here, would you? Just leave.
Sure. I know where the Amulet of Unity is.
Do you have any chores for me? I don't know of anything I could bring you.
You are a Master of House Telvanni. You no longer answer to me, outlander.
Mistress Dratha wants a ring known as the Black Jinx.
I have no other chores for you. Check with my patron, Mistress Dratha, or with the other Mouths.
I have no other chores for you. Check with the other Mouths.
You may also speak with my patron, Mistress Dratha, but be warned that she does not like men.
I do not have any more chores for you. Check with the other Mouths.
I cannot describe the chores you would do for us unless you join House Telvanni.
What do you ask of me, Archmagister?
To become Archmagister you must win the support of all the active Telvanni Councilors.
When you have their support, I can call a vote to see if you will win or if Gothren shall remain Archmagister.
If you cannot get their votes, there is another way...
I believe we can arrange a situation to our mutual benefit.
I will become your patron and ally in House Telvanni if you convince another potential ally, Baladas Demnevanni, to abandon his reclusive ways and join the Council.
You're the outlander that has caused so much trouble. No, don't get me wrong. I am pleased at what you have already accomplished.
I may have a few things for you to do later, but for now speak with Galos Mathendis, my Mouth in Sadrith Mora.
Master Aryon wants a message delivered to Divayth Fyr. Would you carry this coded message?
Archmagister Gothren has some questions for Baladas Demnevanni. Will you speak with Baladas and ask him three questions?
Mistress Therana has requested that someone deliver her new clothes to her.
I will pay 1000 drakes to anyone willing to deliver her new clothes.
Master Neloth needs five portions of Sload Soap.
Daynali Dren, Mistress Dratha's Alchemist, needs five portions of muck.
I have three simple chores for you.
Bring me copies of three Dwemer books.
Of course I'll do a chore for my patron. Tell you what, I know where Master Neloth keeps a hidden Ring of Equity.
I have a certain interest in a robe which is in the possession of one entirely unworthy. This robe is known as the Robe of Drake's Pride.
To complete one of my collections I need the Amulet of Flesh Made Whole.
Have you ever heard of Auriel's Bow? I've heard it's made of ebony and smells of boiled ash yams.
